title: Pakistan names 88 suspects in Priyantha Kumara killing
content: Police in Sialkot have submitted a challan to the prosecution, naming 88 suspects in the killing of Sri Lankan factory manager Priyantha Kumara Diyawadana last December.The videos of the horrific incident have also been included in the challan, reports ‘The Express Tribune.’A colleague of Priyantha, Malik Adnan, who was seen confronting a group of angry men to shield the Sri Lankan man from the angry mob, has been named as a witness in the case.The prosecution team will review the challan and the trial is expected to start next week by a special anti-terrorism court at Lahore’s Kot Lakhpat Jail where the suspects have been transferred from Sialkot.
